title: Pinball Arcade
notes: The configuration utility doesn't launch so you can't change the resolution :(

title: Pinball Arcade
notes: Game configuration utility will not launch, so resolution and graphics options cannot be changed. Since the game defaults to a tiny window, it is arguably unplayable in its current state, but performance is fine. DX11 version of the game will not launch.

title: Pinball Arcade
notes:
DX11 version does not launch.
Couldn't open the configuration utility, so I couldn't change the resolution.

WORKARROUND:
    1. Open ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/238260/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Games/Pinball Arcade/
    2. Open settings.dat in a hex editor
    3. Set the width and height. Both the width and the height are (singed?) 32-bit integers in little-endian byte order. Width starts at offset 0x0C, and height starts immediately after it (at offset 0x10).
DX11 Modes don't work. Configuration tool doesn't work. DX9 version works but requires potential tweaking to set resolution.
title: Pinball Arcade

notes: Requires manual configuration file editing to change resolutions, DX11 modes and configuration utility do not run.  No sound.
title: Pinball Arcade
